title: Shambleau and Others
description: Catherine L. Moore. Shambleau and Others. New York: Gnome, [1953]. First edition, first printing. Octavo. 224 pages. Publisher's binding and dust jacket.List of stories:Black God’s KissShambleauBlack God’s ShadowBlack ThirstThe Tree of LifeJirel Meets MagicScarlet Dream
author: C.L. Moore
